EmailTemplate.description: Officer of DRS emails Claimant at the end of successful application screening
EmailTemplate.name: CTP_DRS_Successful_Screening_Communication_to_Claimant1
EmailTemplate.subject: Application Number {!Case.CaseNumber} Acceptance Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for submitting your application (reference:{!Case.CaseNumber}). My name is {!Case.OwnerFullName} and I am your Dispute Resolution Officer.
I have asked the insurer to reply to your application, and they have until {!Case.Duedate} to send their reply to me.
I have reviewed the information you submitted with your application and I will review this application again when I received the insurer's reply.
If you have any questions about your application please contact me.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerTitle} {!Case.OwnerFullName} L19 / 1 Oxford St, Sydney NSW 2000 {!Case.OwnerPhone}
